SEARCH_USER_BY_USERNAME: SELECT id, username, password, role, created_at, updated_at FROM authentication WHERE username = %s
SEARCH_AUTH_BY_ID: SELECT id, username, password, role, created_at, updated_at FROM authentication WHERE id = %s
SEARCH_USER_BY_ID: SELECT id, name, email, phone_no, id_proof_type, id_proof, gender, verified, created_at, updated_at FROM users Where id = %s
SEARCH_IN_USER_ACCOUNT: select id, account_number, account_type, account_balance, pending_balance, created_at, updated_at from user_account where account_number = %s
SEARCH_IN_ACCOUNT_WITHDRAWN_REQUESTS: select id, uid, status, debited_amount, date, requested_by, approved_by, comments from account_withdraw_requests where status = %s
SEARCH_IN_ACCOUNT_TRANSACTIONS: select id, account_number, transaction_type, amount, created_at, done_by from account_transactions where account_number = %s
SEARCH_IN_USER_ACCOUNT_BY_ID: select id, account_number, account_type, account_balance, pending_balance, created_at, updated_at from user_account where id = %s
SEARCH_USERS_BY_ACCOUNT_STATUS: SELECT id, name, email, phone_no, id_proof_type, id_proof, gender, verified, created_at, updated_at FROM users Where verified = %s
SEARCH_PENDING_REQ_IN_DETAIL_MODIFICATIO: SELECT id, uid, attribute_to_update, attribute_value, status FROM user_details_modification where status = %s
UPDATE_PASSWORD_IN_AUTH: update authentication set password = %s where id = %s
UPDATE_IN_ACCOUNT_WITHDRAWN_REQUESTS: update account_withdraw_requests set status = %s,approved_by = %s,comments = %s where id = %s
UPDATE_PENDING_AMOUNT_IN_ACCOUNT: UPDATE user_account SET pending_balance = %s WHERE id = %s
UPDATE_AMOUNT_IN_ACCOUNT: UPDATE user_account SET account_balance = %s WHERE account_number = %s
UPDATE_VERIFIED_STATUS_OF_CUSTOMER: update users set verified = %s where id = %s
UPDATE_USER_DETAIL_MODIFICATION_STATUS: update user_details_modification set status = %s where id = %s
